Name: A Quest of Wits - II
Description: You meet a strange dual in the Dim Forest. They seem to have peculiar questions for you. Answer their questions correctly, and you might receive some rewards.
QuestDesc: You meet a strange dual in the Dim Forest. They seem to have peculiar questions for you. Answer their questions correctly, and you might receive some rewards.

Dialogues.Speaker: Anxious Researcher
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Why are there so many Hoochiefs in the cave? Ah!

Dialogues.Speaker: Anxious Researcher
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Phew... Almost scared me to death. The Hoochiefs could be coming my way.

Dialogues.Speaker: Anxious Researcher
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I wonder why there are so many Hoochiefs here. If someone could get rid of them, I'll reward {Male=him;Female=her} generously!

Dialogues.Speaker: Anxious Researcher
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Why are there so many Hoochiefs in the cave?

Options.PlotLineKey: I got rid of them all.

Dialogues.Speaker: Anxious Researcher
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You, you did? That was awe-inspiring! Here, take this. It's your reward for dealing with the Hoochiefs!

Dialogues.Speaker: Anxious Researcher
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sigh, I wonder why there are so many Hoochiefs...

Dialogues.Speaker: Quwen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Quiz number one. What is Jinhsi's job title?

Dialogues.Speaker: Quiz
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Quiz number one answered! Magistrate of Jinzhou.

Dialogues.Speaker: Quiz
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Take your reward and come back for more tomorrow!

Dialogues.Speaker: Quwen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Difficulties arise. Rover confused.

Dialogues.Speaker: Quwen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you see it through, return and be my guest!

Dialogues.Speaker: Quwen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Difficulties arise. Rover confused.

Dialogues.Speaker: Quwen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you see it through, return and be my guest!

Dialogues.Speaker: Quwen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Difficulties arise. Rover confused.

Dialogues.Speaker: Quwen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you see it through, return and be my guest!

Dialogues.Speaker: Quiz
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Quiz Number Two. Who do you ask for peace?

Dialogues.Speaker: Quiz
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Quiz Number Two, answer! Ask Patrol Station for peace.

Dialogues.Speaker: Quiz
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Take your reward and come back for more tomorrow!

Dialogues.Speaker: Quwen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Difficulties arise. Rover confused.

Dialogues.Speaker: Quwen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you see it through, return and be my guest!

Dialogues.Speaker: Quiz
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Moon hanging from the trees, where can you find blessings?

Dialogues.Speaker: Quiz
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Quiz Number Three answered! Violuna Banyan in Dim Forest.

Dialogues.Speaker: Quiz
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Take your reward. The quizzes are no more.

Dialogues.Speaker: Quwen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Difficulties arise. Rover confused.

Dialogues.Speaker: Quwen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you see it through, return and be my guest!

Dialogues.Speaker: Quiz
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Quizzes are no more!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lazing Around Researcher
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is so exhausting. Another overtime session... I want to go home.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lazing Around Researcher
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Why are they still not here...

Dialogues.Speaker: Lazing Around Researcher
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: When will the mushroom soup...

Dialogues.Speaker: Lazing Around Researcher
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Be ready in the cave?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chuyi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hello. Could you deliver this data chip to the researcher on the top for me?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chuyi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's very kind of you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chuyi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'd love to, but I'm on duty now, so it would be improper...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chuyi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you so much! As this is a private request of mine, I'm paying you in advance. I'll be waiting for you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lazing Around Researcher
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I should not cook mushroom soup next time...

Options.PlotLineKey: First wants you to see this.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lazing Around Researcher
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hm? This is...

Dialogues.Speaker: Lazing Around Researcher
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is the data chip that I kept looking for! How did he find it? Impressive!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lazing Around Researcher
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Valuable data about my work is stored in the chip! I was so spaced out that after this went missing I began slacking off.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lazing Around Researcher
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now I should return to work. Oh, I've got something for you. Take it. Thanks for the help.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sanshi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hello, I am Thirty, a Patroller stationed in Dim Forest. You can always ask me about anything you want to know in Dim Forest.

Options.PlotLineKey: What's going on in Dim Forest?

Dialogues.Speaker: Sanshi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The toxin spores are still drifting. You might find Frenzy Hoochief around here. Be on your alert when you travel!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lazing Around Researcher
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is so exhausting. Another overtime session... I want to go home. Ah! Who are you? What did you hear?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lazing Around Researcher
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Really? Did you hear anything?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lazing Around Researcher
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Phew... Great. I wasn't doing anything, just enjoying the scenery and the breezes, while waiting for my mushroom soup.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lazing Around Researcher
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wh, what? I, I wasn't!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lazing Around Researcher
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I was taking some reasonable rest!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lazing Around Researcher
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The reasonable rest is an art. An art that allows you to respond to whatever you are called upon immediately.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lazing Around Researcher
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The reasonable rest is a precondition for the research to progress, and an assurance of its stability.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lazing Around Researcher
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: To say the least, I wasn't doing anything, just enjoying the scenery and the breezes, while waiting for my mushroom soup.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lazing Around Researcher
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What? I cooked a lot of mushrooms. Wait.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lazing Around Researcher
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Call a doctor for me, a doctor...

Dialogues.Speaker: Sanshi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hello, I am Thirty, a Patroller stationed in Dim Forest. You can always ask me about anything you want to know in Dim Forest.

Options.PlotLineKey: What's going on in Dim Forest?

Dialogues.Speaker: Sanshi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey:
The issues here are solved. I heard a powerful Resonator
was of great help. How I want to meet {Male=him;Female=her}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chuyi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hello, anything I can help you with?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chuyi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is a station of Huanglong's inspection team in Dim Forest. We test and monitor the soil in the Forest.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chuyi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Dim Forest suffers continuously from the toxin spores, which is why the soil means so much to the ecosystem here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chuyi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The earth breathes through the soil, so we are the pneumologists of the Forest.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chuyi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, he's my buddy. The name's Fifteenth.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chuyi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I adopted him on the fifteenth of the first lunar month, hence the name. Just like me, because I was born on the first of the first lunar month.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chuyi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Though he looks unfriendly, you need only to let him know before you pet him.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shiwu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Woof! Woof, woof!

Dialogues.Speaker: Actor No. 1
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Meow meow...

Dialogues.Speaker: Actor No. 1
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're so cute, Meow meow. All cats are called Meow Meow, haha.

Dialogues.Speaker: Hardworking Researcher
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Data... Analysis...

Dialogues.Speaker: Researcher Checking Materials
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Didn't I ask them to send in the requests?...

Dialogues.Speaker: Actor No. 1
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Why is this request amended again? It's been so many times...

Dialogues.Speaker: Actor No. 2
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let me see. Isn't it returning to v1.0?

Dialogues.Speaker: Actor No. 3
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is bothering us so much. Can we call in the almighty Mr. Mortefi?

Dialogues.Speaker: Quwen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Today's quiz was answered. Come back tomorrow!
